Enter your Hume AI API key from the Hume: Enter your Hume AI API key from the Hume Portal (https://platform.hume.ai/settings/keys)
Convert text to speech using Hume AI's e: Convert text to speech using Hume AI's expressive text-to-speech technology
Convert audio file to speech using Hume: Convert audio file to speech using Hume AI's expressive text-to-speech technology
Save a custom voice to your account usin: Save a custom voice to your account using a TTS generation ID
Delete a custom voice from your account: Delete a custom voice from your account
Start a batch emotion analysis job for m: Start a batch emotion analysis job for media files hosted at URLs
Retrieve emotion analysis predictions fr: Retrieve emotion analysis predictions from a completed batch job
The text to convert to speech: The text to convert to speech
Natural language description of how the: Natural language description of how the speech should sound (tone, accent, style, etc.). If no voice is specified, this will generate a dynamic voice.
Speed multiplier for the synthesized spe: Speed multiplier for the synthesized speech (0.75-1.5 recommended)
Number of audio generations to produce (: Number of audio generations to produce (1-5 recommended)
Optional context text to influence speec: Optional context text to influence speech style and prosody consistency
Description for the context text (how it: Description for the context text (how it should sound)
Duration of silence to add at the end of: Duration of silence to add at the end of the speech
Automatically split text into natural-so: Automatically split text into natural-sounding speech segments
The unique ID from a previous TTS genera: The unique ID from a previous TTS generation to save as a custom voice
A descriptive name for your custom voice: A descriptive name for your custom voice
The name of the custom voice to delete: The name of the custom voice to delete
URLs to media files to analyze (images,: URLs to media files to analyze (images, videos, audio). Supports up to 100 URLs or archives (.zip, .tar.gz)
Specify which models to use for inferenc: Specify which models to use for inference. Leave empty to run all models.
Include speech-to-text transcription in: Include speech-to-text transcription in the analysis
Optional webhook URL to receive results: Optional webhook URL to receive results when the job completes
Send email notification upon job complet: Send email notification upon job completion or failure
The ID of the emotion analysis job to re: The ID of the emotion analysis job to retrieve results for
Triggers when a new voice is created in: Triggers when a new voice is created in Hume AI
